title: A Tribute to Neil Armstrong – StarTalk Radio Cosmic Queries
description: Our first Cosmic Queries episode: Neil deGrasse Tyson answers questions from fans and offers personal reflections in a “Tribute to Neil Armstrong.”
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
